001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
007import java.util.Objects;
008
009import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
010
011import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
012import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
013import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
014import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
015import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioTemplateFinder.SimpleTemplateFinder;
016
017/**
018 * Finds templates based on the model type (class).
019 * <p>
020 * The default {@link JStachio} uses a combination of relection and the ServiceLoader to
021 * find templates.
022 * <p>
023 * Other implementations may want to use their DI framework like Spring or CDI to find
024 * templates.
025 *
026 * @author agentgt
027 *
028 */
029public non-sealed interface JStachioTemplateFinder extends JStachioExtension {
030
031        /**
032         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise possibly falling back to a
033         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata or some other mechanism.
034         *
035         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
036         * template was returned instead of the fallback {@link TemplateInfo} metadata.
037         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
038         * not the Templates class</em>)
039         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
040         * template was found.
041         * @throws Exception if any reflection or runtime error happens
042         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found and there were no other
043         * errors
044         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
045         */
046        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception;
047
048        /**
049         * Finds a template or null if no template is found. Should not throw an exception if
050         * a template is not found.
051         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
052         * not the Templates class</em>)
053         * @return <code>null</code> if the template is was not found or the template info
054         * which might be a {@link Template} if the generated template was found.
055         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
056         * @see #findTemplate(Class)
057         */
058        default @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
059                Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
060                try {
061                        return findTemplate(modelType);
062                }
063                catch (Exception e) {
064                        return null;
065                }
066        }
067
068        /**
069         * Determines if this template finder has a template for the model type (the class
070         * annotated by JStache).
071         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
072         * not the Templates class</em>)
073         * @return true if this finder has template for modelType
074         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
075         */
076        default boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
077                var t = findOrNull(modelType);
078                if (t == null) {
079                        return false;
080                }
081                return true;
082        }
083
084        /**
085         * Hint on order of template finders. The found {@link JStachioTemplateFinder}s are
086         * sorted naturally (lower number comes first) based on the returned number. Thus a
087         * template finder with a lower order number that {@link #supportsType(Class)} the
088         * model class will be used.
089         * @return default returns zero
090         */
091        default int order() {
092                return 0;
093        }
094
095        /**
096         * The default template finder that uses reflection and or the ServiceLoader.
097         * <p>
098         * <em>This implementation performs no caching. If you would like caching call
099         * {@link #cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder)} on the returned finder.</em>
100         * @param config used to help find templates as well as logging.
101         * @return default template finder.
102         */
103        public static JStachioTemplateFinder defaultTemplateFinder(JStachioConfig config) {
104                return new DefaultTemplateFinder(config);
105        }
106
107        /**
108         * Decorates a template finder with a cache using {@link ClassValue} with the
109         * modelType as the key.
110         * <p>
111         * <em>While the finder does not provide any eviction the cache will not prevent
112         * garbage collection of the model classes.</em>
113         * @param finder to be decorated unless the finder is already decorated thus it is a
114         * noop to repeateadly call this method on already cached template finder.
115         * @return caching template finder
116         */
117        public static JStachioTemplateFinder cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder finder) {
118                if (finder instanceof ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder) {
119                        return finder;
120                }
121                return new ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder(finder);
122        }
123
124        /**
125         * Creates a template finder from an iterable of templates. The returned finder will
126         * just loop through the templates and call {@link TemplateInfo#supportsType(Class)}.
127         * To avoid the looping cost wrap the return with
128         * {@link #cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder)}.
129         * @param templates templates to be searched in order of the iterable
130         * @param order order hint see {@link #order()}.
131         * @return adapted template finder
132         */
133        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates, int order) {
134                return new IterableTemplateFinder(templates, order);
135        }
136
137        /**
138         * Creates a composite template finder from a list. If the list only has a single
139         * element then it is returned without being wrapped.
140         * @param templateFinders list of template finders.
141         * @return templateFinder searching in order of {@link #order()} then the list order
142         */
143        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(List<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> templateFinders) {
144                return CompositeTemplateFinder.of(templateFinders);
145        }
146
147        /**
148         * An easier to implement template finder based on a sequence of templates.
149         *
150         * @author agentgt
151         *
152         */
153        public interface SimpleTemplateFinder extends JStachioTemplateFinder {
154
155                @Override
156                default TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
157                        Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
158                        var t = findOrNull(modelType);
159                        if (t == null) {
160                                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
161                        }
162                        return t;
163                }
164
165                @Override
166                default boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
167                        Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
168                        var t = findOrNull(modelType);
169                        if (t == null) {
170                                return false;
171                        }
172                        return true;
173                }
174
175                @Override
176                default @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
177                        for (var t : templates()) {
178                                if (t.supportsType(modelType)) {
179                                        return t;
180                                }
181                        }
182                        return null;
183                }
184
185                /**
186                 * Sequence of templates used to find matching template from model.
187                 * @return templates
188                 */
189                Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates();
190
191        }
192
193}
194
195final class DefaultTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
196
197        private final JStachioConfig config;
198
199        DefaultTemplateFinder(JStachioConfig config) {
200                super();
201                this.config = config;
202        }
203
204        @Override
205        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
206                return Templates.findTemplate(modelType, config);
207        }
208
209        @Override
210        public @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
211                return Templates.findTemplateOrNull(modelType, config);
212        }
213
214        @Override
215        public int order() {
216                return Integer.MAX_VALUE;
217        }
218
219}
220
221class TemplateNotFoundException extends NoSuchElementException {
222
223        private static final long serialVersionUID = -4016359589653582060L;
224
225        private final Class<?> modelType;
226
227        protected TemplateNotFoundException(Class<?> modelType, @Nullable String message, @Nullable Throwable cause) {
228                super(message, cause);
229                this.modelType = modelType;
230        }
231
232        public TemplateNotFoundException(Class<?> modelType) {
233                this(modelType, errorMessage(modelType), (Throwable) null);
234        }
235
236        protected static String errorMessage(Class<?> modelType) {
237                return "template not found for type: " + modelType;
238        }
239
240        public Class<?> modelType() {
241                return modelType;
242        }
243
244}
245
246final class IterableTemplateFinder implements SimpleTemplateFinder {
247
248        private final Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates;
249
250        private final int order;
251
252        public IterableTemplateFinder(Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates, int order) {
253                super();
254                this.templates = templates;
255                this.order = order;
256        }
257
258        @Override
259        public int order() {
260                return this.order;
261        }
262
263        @Override
264        public Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates() {
265                return templates;
266        }
267
268}
269
270final class ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
271
272        private final ClassValue<TemplateInfo> cache;
273
274        private final JStachioTemplateFinder delegate;
275
276        public ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder delegate) {
277                super();
278                this.delegate = delegate;
279                this.cache = new ClassValue<>() {
280
281                        @Override
282                        protected @Nullable TemplateInfo computeValue(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
283                                try {
284                                        return delegate.findTemplate(type);
285                                }
286                                catch (Exception e) {
287                                        Templates.sneakyThrow(e);
288                                        throw new RuntimeException();
289                                }
290                        }
291                };
292        }
293
294        @Override
295        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
296                return cache.get(modelType);
297        }
298
299        @Override
300        public int order() {
301                return delegate.order();
302        }
303
304}
305
306final class CompositeTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
307
308        private final Iterable<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> finders;
309
310        private CompositeTemplateFinder(Iterable<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> finders) {
311                super();
312                this.finders = finders;
313        }
314
315        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(List<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> finders) {
316                if (finders.size() == 1) {
317                        return finders.get(0);
318                }
319                ArrayList<JStachioTemplateFinder> sorted = new ArrayList<>();
320                sorted.addAll(finders);
321                sorted.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(JStachioTemplateFinder::order));
322                return new CompositeTemplateFinder(List.copyOf(sorted));
323        }
324
325        @Override
326        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
327                for (var f : finders) {
328                        var t = f.findOrNull(modelType);
329                        if (t != null) {
330                                return t;
331                        }
332                }
333                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
334        }
335
336        @Override
337        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
338                for (var f : finders) {
339                        var b = f.supportsType(modelType);
340                        if (b)
341                                return true;
342                }
343                return false;
344        }
345
346}
